description:
Connect MCP Clients, AI assistants and developer tools to Gmail, Google Calendar, Docs, Sheets, Slides, Chat, Forms, Tasks, Search & Drive through the Model Context Protocol!

The most feature-complete Google Workspace / G Suite MCP server, now with Remote OAuth2.1 multi-user support and 1-click Claude installation!

tools.description: Comma-separated list of tools to enable (gmail,drive,calendar,docs,sheets,chat,forms,slides,tasks,search). Leave empty for all tools.

googlePseApiKey.description: API key for Google Custom Search - required for search tools

userGoogleEmail.description: Default email for single-user auth - avoids needing to specify email in system prompts

googlePseEngineId.description: Programmable Search Engine ID for Custom Search - required for search tools

mcpSingleUserMode.description: Enable single-user mode - bypasses session mapping

googleOauthClientId.description: Your Google OAuth 2.0 Client ID from Google Cloud Console

workspaceMcpBaseUri.description: Base URI for the server (do not include port)

googleClientSecretPath.description: Path to client_secret.json file (alternative to environment variables)

googleOauthRedirectUri.description: OAuth redirect URI - uses default http://localhost:8000/oauth2callback if not set

googleOauthClientSecret.description: Your Google OAuth 2.0 Client Secret from Google Cloud Console

oauthlibInsecureTransport.description: Enable insecure transport for development environments

workspaceMcpStatelessMode.description: Enable stateless mode - no session persistence
